title: Alphabet Earnings Are Coming. Expect Strength in Ads and Cloud Computing.
text: The Street expects the parent of Google and YouTube to post sales of $76 billion, up 10% from a year earlier, with profits of $1.46 a share.

title: Alphabet Earnings Preview: The Best Mega Cap Tech Stock in the Market?
text: Earnings season is in full swing, and this week is packed with market leading reports. Google parent company Alphabet  GOOGL  reports earnings Tuesday, October 24 after the market closes.

title: Microsoft & Alphabet Earnings: What Key Metrics Say
text: Earnings season continues to capture the spotlight, with several big tech companies slated to take center stage this week. The period has primarily been positive so far, again helping us elude an ‘earnings meltdown' many had feared.

title: The Magnificent 7 Stocks Are a Pre-Earnings Buy (Despite the Tesla Miss!)
text: One down. Six to go. Tesla (NASDAQ: TSLA ) kicked off third-quarter earnings season for the so-called Magnificent 7 of the Nasdaq last week with a thud.

title: Google Earnings Watch: YouTube Rebound, Cloud Growth, Gemini Launch
text: When Google parent Alphabet reports third-quarter earnings Tuesday, analysts expect earnings to pop on easier year-over-year comparisons.

title: Google Faces Antitrust Investigation in Japan Over Search Practices
text: Japan's trade regulator opened an investigation into search practices by Alphabet's Google (GOOGL) for potential violations of the country's antitrust laws.

title: 2 Hypergrowth Tech Stocks to Buy in 2023 and Beyond
text: Alphabet and Microsoft have long histories of offering significant stock growth. Alphabet's dominance in digital advertising and AI expansion could offer big gains in the coming years.

title: Japan probes Google over alleged antitrust violations as global scrutiny mounts
text: Japan's probe is the latest sign of a mounting global crackdown of Google's business practices.

title: AI and cloud spending a major focus of Big Tech earnings: analysts
text: Microsoft, Alphabet, Amazon, and Meta will release earnings this week, with the Street's focus expected to be on what the enterprise spending trajectory looks like on the cloud in a "choppy" macro environment, according to Wedbush analysts.   In an update to clients, they noted that Microsoft is a "major bellwether" for cloud spending and especially the appetite for generative AI spending among chief investment officers, with Wedbush analysts expecting the company's all-important Azure revenue growth to exceed Microsoft's own guidance based on their positive checks in the field.

title: Why Google, Bing and other search engines' embrace of generative AI threatens $68 billion SEO industry
text: Google, Microsoft and others boast that generative artificial intelligence tools like ChatGPT will make searching the internet better than ever for users. For example, rather than having to wade through a sea of URLs, users will be able to just get an answer combed from the entire internet.

title: What to Expect From FAANG Stock Earnings This Week
text: A flood of new earnings reports will come out this week. Among the FAANG stocks, Meta, Alphabet, and Amazon are set to release their latest results.

title: Downgrading Google To Hold, Buy Microsoft For More Upside
text: Google's share buybacks should have a positive impact on share prices, but not this much. Google Cloud still shows strong growth but represents a mere 10% of total revenues. Microsoft is better positioned than Google to capture on upcoming growth prospects with a well-diversified product portfolio, whereas Google relies heavily on Google Ads income.

title: Earnings Preview of Alphabet: ETFs in Focus
text: The search engine behemoth Alphabet (GOOGL) is expected to report its earnings on Oct 24.

title: 'Extremely bearish' chart formation signals the top 7 Big Tech stocks including Apple, Nvidia, and Tesla face elevated risk of a selloff
text: An "extremely bearish" pattern has formed on the Magnificent 7 stocks' combined price chart, fueling fears of a selloff. "For what's worth, the top 7 largest tech stocks are currently staring down from a scary double-top technical formation," Crescat Capital's Octavio Costa wrote in a LinkedIn post.

title: Google facing antitrust investigation in Japan
text: Google is set to be investigated by Japan's Fair Trade Commision after it was found that the digital service provider accounts for around 70% of all online searches made in the country, reports revealed. Aiming to find out whether Google asks mobile users to provide preferential treatment to its search engine over competitors, the investigation, if found to be true, will find the US tech giant in breach of Japan's Antimonopoly act.

title: Japan probes Google for alleged antitrust violations in search practices
text: The Japan Fair Trade Commission said it is examining if Google arranged with Android smartphone makers to prioritize its own apps and services.

title: The GOOG Gold Rush: Why Analysts are Betting Big on Alphabet
text: Alphabet (NASDAQ: GOOG ) is one of the top growth stocks most investors either own (directly or via an index fund) or wish they had owned in recent years. This is a company that's made impressive advancements in AI technology and is at the forefront of other high-growth businesses.

title: Alphabet Stock: Bear vs. Bull
text: Alphabet could be negatively impacted by the rise of AI. The company's dominance in the search engine market can't be overstated.

title: The Last Chance to Buy These 7 Millionaire-Maker Stocks
text: 2023 has been a significantly better year as compared to 2022. However, several stocks have slipped amid the growing uncertainties and high-interest rates.
